public ref class MenuItemBinding sealed : ICloneable, System::Web::UI::IDataSourceViewSchemaAccessor, System::Web::UI::IStateManager

summary.span: 定义一个数据项与 控件中该数据项绑定到的菜单项之间的关系。

span.span: Defines the relationship between a data item and the menu item it is binding to in a control.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当控件绑定到其中的每个数据项包含多个字段的数据源 （如具有多个特性的 XML 元素），如果未不定义任何菜单项绑定，菜单项显示返回的值`ToString()`方法默认情况下的数据项。When the control is bound to a data source where each data item contains multiple fields (such as an XML element with several attributes), if no menu item bindings are defined, a menu item displays the value returned by the `ToString()` method of the data item by default. 对于 XML 元素，该菜单项显示的元素名称，但显示的基础结构的菜单上，否则不是非常有用。In the case of an XML element, the menu item displays the element name, which shows the underlying structure of the menu, but is not very useful otherwise. 通过指定菜单项绑定，可以将菜单项的属性绑定到特定的字段。You can bind the properties of a menu item to a specific field by specifying menu item bindings. A对象定义的每个数据项和它所绑定到的菜单项之间的关系。A object defines the relationship between each data item and the menu item it is binding to. > [!NOTE] > 当控件绑定到控件，菜单项绑定不起任何作用。When the control is bound to a control, menu item bindings have no effect. 使用站点地图提供商提供自动执行绑定。Binding is performed automatically using the site map provider. 控制存储其中的对象属性并将绑定应用于要创建菜单层次结构和数据源层次结构之间的一对一关系的数据源。The control stores its objects in the property and applies the bindings to the data source to create a one-to-one relationship between the menu hierarchy and the data source hierarchy. 为数据源中的每个数据项控件尝试匹配数据项目写入到对象来创建相应的对象。For each data item in the data source, the control attempts to match the data item to a object to create the corresponding object. 在创建时对象，你必须指定用于绑定的条件。When creating a object, you must specify the criteria for binding. 该条件指示何时数据项应绑定到的菜单项。The criteria indicate when a data item should be bound to a menu item. 你可以指定、 ，和/或文件名。You can specify the , the , or both. 菜单项深度指定获取绑定的菜单级别。A menu item depth specifies the menu level that gets bound. 例如，以下声明将绑定到数据源的名称和 ID 字段和属性，分别的所有节点的深度为 0:For example, the following declaration binds the Name and ID fields of the data source to the and properties, respectively, of all nodes with a depth of 0: ``` ``` 数据成员在基础数据源中，指定的数据项目类型，但可以表示不同的信息，具体取决于数据源。A data member specifies the type of the data item in the underlying data source, but can represent different information depending on the data source. 层次结构数据源中的每个数据项 (由表示对象) 公开属性，用于指定数据项目的类型。Each data item in a hierarchical data source (represented by an object) exposes a property, which specifies the type of the data item. 例如，XML 元素的数据成员指定元素的名称。For example, the data member for an XML element specifies the name of the element. 数据成员时数据源包含多个数据项目类型，指定的数据项目类型使用。When a data source contains multiple data item types, the data member specifies which data item type to use. 以下声明绑定``元素的菜单中，而不考虑位置层次结构中的所有菜单项的控件：The following declaration binds the `` elements of an control to all the menu items in the menu, regardless of the location in the hierarchy: ``` ``` 有时你可能需要创建一个指定的深度和数据成员的菜单项绑定。Sometimes you might need to create a menu item binding that specifies both a depth and a data member. 仅当数据源包含在具有相同的数据成员值的不同级别的项目时，经常使用这种。This is often used when the data source contains items at different levels that have the same data member value. 例如，你可以``出现在 XML 文件中的不同级别的元素。For example, you can have `` elements that appear at different levels within an XML file. 以下的声明显示了如何指定应用于相同的数据成员位于不同的菜单深度的菜单项绑定：The following declarations show how to specify menu item bindings that apply to identical data members at different menu depths: `` `` 如果菜单项绑定定义的深度和数据成员中，菜单项绑定适用于菜单中的所有菜单项。If a menu item binding is defined without a depth and a data member, the menu item binding is applied to all menu items within the menu. 这常用当所有数据项目具有相同的属性，并且应相同，显示无论菜单深度。This is commonly used when all data items have the same properties and should be displayed identically, regardless of the menu depth. 建立绑定条件后，你可以随后绑定的属性可以绑定到一个值的对象。After the binding criteria are established, you can then bind a property of a object that can be bound to a value. 你可以将绑定到数据项目的字段或为静态值。You can bind to a field of a data item or to a static value. 当绑定到静态值，所有对象向其应用对象共享相同的值。When bound to a static value, all objects to which the object is applied share the same value. 绑定到字段的属性包含相应数据源的字段的值。Properties bound to fields contain the values of the corresponding field from the data source. > [!NOTE] > 你可以选择性地重写中的绑定的属性通过直接设置对应的属性的对象。You can selectively override a bound property in a object by setting the corresponding property directly. 下表列出的属性允许您绑定的属性的类数据项的字段的对象。The following table lists the properties of the class that allow you to bind a property of the object to a field of a data item. |PropertyProperty|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||要将绑定到的字段属性对象。The field to bind to the property of a object.| ||要将绑定到的字段属性对象。The field to bind to the property of a object.| ||要将绑定到的字段属性对象。The field to bind to the property of a object.| ||要将绑定到的字段属性对象。The field to bind to the property of a object.| ||要将绑定到的字段属性对象。The field to bind to the property of a object.| 下表列出的属性允许您绑定的属性的类为静态值的对象。The following table lists the properties of the class that allow you to bind a property of the object to a static value. |PropertyProperty|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||要将绑定到的静态值属性对象。The static value to bind to the property of a object.| ||要将绑定到的静态值属性对象。The static value to bind to the property of a object.| ||要将绑定到的静态值属性对象。The static value to bind to the property of a object.| ||要将绑定到的静态值属性对象。The static value to bind to the property of a object.| ||要将绑定到的静态值属性对象。The static value to bind to the property of a object.| ||要将绑定到的静态值属性对象。The static value to bind to the property of a object.| 如果冲突定义对象，控件适用以下优先顺序中的菜单项绑定：If conflicting objects are defined, the control applies the menu item bindings in the following order of precedence: 1. 定义并匹配深度和数据成员的对象。The object that defines and matches both a depth and a data member. 2. 定义并匹配的数据成员的对象。The object that defines and matches the data member only. 3. 对象定义并匹配仅的深度。The object that defines and matches the depth only. 4. 定义既不深度，也不数据成员的对象。The object that defines neither the depth nor the data member. （此类型的菜单项绑定适用于菜单中的所有菜单项。）(This type of menu item binding is applied to all menu items in the menu.) 5. 数据源中没有匹配项的对象。The object that does not have a match in the data source. 在这种情况下，返回的值`ToString()`数据项方法然后绑定到和属性对其的菜单项应用对象。In this case, the value returned by the `ToString()` method of the data item is then bound to the and properties of the menu items to which the object is applied. 类还允许您通过设置显示在菜单项的文本格式属性。The class also allows you to format the text displayed in a menu item by setting the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用对象定义的字段之间的关系控制和中的菜单项控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use objects to define the relationship between the fields of an control and the menu items in a control. 对于此示例中正常工作，必须将下面的示例 XML 数据复制到一个名为 Menu.xml 文件。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data below to a file named Menu.xml. MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Enabled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否启用应用 对象的菜单项，以允许此菜单项显示一个弹出图像和任何子菜单项。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the menu item to which the object is applied is enabled, allowing the item to display a pop-out image and any child menu items.

value.span: 如果启用应用 的菜单项，则为 ，否则为 。

span.span: if the menu item to which the is applied is enabled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来设置属性对象。Use the property to set the property of a object. 此设置会对其的所有菜单项与共享应用对象。This setting is shared with all menu items to which the object is applied. 当此属性设置为`false`，菜单项被禁用并且不指示子项目的弹出图像将显示。When this property is set to `false`, the menu item is disabled and no pop-out image that indicates child items is displayed. 此属性设置为`false`的菜单项就是使该菜单项的末尾该节点，其中任何进一步的级别会显示从该节点中移出。Setting this property to `false` for a menu item essentially makes the menu item the end of that node, where no further levels are shown off of that node.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ EnabledField { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

value.span: 绑定到应用 的 的 的字段的名称。

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置此属性。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当控件绑定到数据源，请使用属性来指定要绑定到的字段名称属性对象。When the control is bound to a data source, use the property to specify the name of the field to bind to the property of a object. > [!NOTE] > 你可以重写各个菜单项启用通过设置其直接属性。You can override the enabling of an individual menu item by setting its property directly. 如果数据源包含多个表或属性，您必须首先建立绑定条件设置属性，属性，和 / 或。If the data source contains multiple tables or attributes, you must first establish the binding criteria by setting the property, the property, or both. > [!NOTE] > 如果和都设置属性，属性优先。If the and properties are both set, the property takes precedence.

span.span: Gets or sets the string that specifies the display format for the text of a menu item to which the object is applied.

value.span: 格式字符串，用于指定应用 的菜单项的文本显示格式。

span.span: A formatting string that specifies the display format for the text of a menu item to which the is applied.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置此属性。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性用于为菜单项的文本提供自定义格式。The property is used to provide a custom format for a menu item's text. 格式字符串可以包含文本字符串、 一个占位符，或两者。The format string can consist of a literal string, a placeholder, or both. 占位符替换为用于绑定到的菜单项文本的值时，将按原义，显示的文本字符串。The literal string is displayed verbatim, while the placeholder is replaced with the value that is bound to the menu item's text. 占位符拆分为两个部分，在窗体中，以冒号分隔 {`A`:`Bxx`}。The placeholder is split into two parts, separated by a colon, in the form {`A`:`Bxx`}. 例如，{0: f2} 显示一个带两位小数定点数。For example, {0:F2} displays a fixed-point number with two decimal places. > [!NOTE] > 占位符字符串必须括在大括号以指示它是一个占位符，而不是文本字符串中。The placeholder string must be enclosed in braces to indicate that it is a placeholder and not a literal string. 大括号外的任何文本显示为文字文本。Any text outside the braces is displayed as literal text. 标准格式字符串语法，冒号前的值将保持 (`A`常规示例中) 从零开始的参数列表中，指定的参数索引。Keeping to the standard formatting string syntax, the value before the colon (`A` in the general example) specifies the parameter index in a zero-based list of parameters. 因为可以在每个菜单项中显示只有一个值，则参数索引可以设置只为 0。Because only one value can be displayed in each menu item, the parameter index can be set only to 0. 冒号后面的字符 (`B`常规示例中) 指定值的显示格式。The character after the colon (`B` in the general example) specifies the display format for the value. 下表列出了常见的格式。The following table lists the common formats. |格式字符Format character|描述Description| |----------------------|-----------------| |`C`|以货币格式显示数字值。Displays numeric values in currency format.| |`D`|以十进制格式显示数字值。Displays numeric values in decimal format.| |`E`|以科学记数 （指数） 格式显示数值。Displays numeric values in scientific (exponential) format.| |`F`|采用固定格式显示数字值。Displays numeric values in fixed format.| |`G`|以常规格式显示数字值。Displays numeric values in general format.| |`N`|采用数字格式显示数字值。Displays numeric values in number format.| |`X`|以十六进制格式显示数字值。Displays numeric values in hexadecimal format.| > [!NOTE] > 格式字符不区分大小写，除`X`，它会显示在指定的大小写的十六进制字符。The format characters are not case-sensitive, except for `X`, which displays the hexadecimal characters in the case specified. 格式字符后的值 (`xx`常规示例中) 指定的有效位数或小数位数显示数量。The value after the format character (`xx` in the general example) specifies the number of significant digits or decimal places to display. 有关设置字符串格式的详细信息，请参阅[格式设置类型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information on formatting strings, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性设置中的菜单项显示的文本的格式控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to format the text displayed in the menu items of a control. 对于此示例中正常工作，必须将下面的示例 XML 数据复制到一个名为 Menu.xml 文件。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data below to a file named Menu.xml. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuItemBinding#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemBinding/CS/menuitembindingcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuItemBinding#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemBinding/VB/menuitembindingvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码是前面的示例的示例站点地图数据。The following code is sample site map data for the previous example. `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` ``

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ImageUrl { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置显示在应用 对象的菜单项文本旁边的图像的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL to an image that is displayed next to the text of a menu item to which the object is applied.

value.span: 显示在应用 的菜单项文本旁边的图像的 URL。

span.span: The URL to an image that is displayed next to the text of a menu item to which the is applied.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置此属性。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当控件绑定到数据源，请使用属性来指定要绑定到自定义图像的 URL属性对象。When the control is bound to a data source, use the property to specify the URL of a custom image to bind to the property of a object. 与所有共享此映像对象向其应用对象。This image is shared with all objects to which the object is applied. 图像将显示菜单项的文本的旁边，并且可以是任何文件格式 （.jpg、.gif、.bmp、 等），只要客户端的浏览器支持该格式。The image is displayed next to a menu item's text and can be in any file format (.jpg, .gif, .bmp, and so on), as long as the client's browser supports that format. > [!NOTE] > 可以通过设置重写各个菜单项的图像其直接属性。You can override the image for an individual menu item by setting its property directly. 而不是使用此属性来显示每个菜单项中的同一个映像，你可以使用属性将绑定属性到数据源的字段的对象。Instead of using this property to display the same image in each menu item, you can also use the property to bind the property of a object to a field of a data source. 呈现时，到每个菜单项的属性应用对象包含的字段中的相应值。When rendered, the property of each menu item to which the object is applied contains the corresponding value from the field. > [!NOTE] > 如果和都设置属性，属性优先。If the and properties are both set, the property takes precedence. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定要显示的菜单项的文本旁边的图像的 URL。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the URL to an image to display next to the text of the menu items. 此映像显示在每个菜单项应用对象。This image is displayed in each menu item to which the object is applied. 对于此示例中正常工作，必须将下面的示例 XML 数据复制到一个名为 Menu.xml 文件。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data below to a file named Menu.xml. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuItemBindingText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemBindingText/CS/menuitembindingtextcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuItemBindingText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemBindingText/VB/menuitembindingtextvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码是前面的示例的示例站点地图数据。The following code is sample site map data for the previous example. `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` ``

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当控件绑定到数据源，请使用属性来指定要绑定到的字段名称属性对象。When the control is bound to a data source, use the property to specify the name of the field to bind to the property of a object. 呈现时，到每个菜单项的属性应用对象包含的字段中的相应值。When rendered, the property of each menu item to which the object is applied contains the corresponding value from the field. 图像将显示菜单项的文本的旁边，并且可以是任何文件格式 （.jpg、.gif、.bmp、 等），只要客户端的浏览器支持该格式。The image is displayed next to a menu item's text and can be in any file format (.jpg, .gif, .bmp, and so on), as long as the client's browser supports that format. > [!NOTE] > 可以通过设置重写各个菜单项的图像其直接属性。You can override the image for an individual menu item by setting its property directly. 如果数据源包含多个表或属性，您必须首先建立绑定条件设置属性，属性，和 / 或。If the data source contains multiple tables or attributes, you must first establish the binding criteria by setting the property, the property, or both. 而不是使用此属性将绑定属性对象移到一个字段，你可以还将其绑定到静态值通过设置属性。Instead of using this property to bind the property of a object to a field, you can also bind it to a static value by setting the property. 这使你可以向其每个菜单项中显示相同映像应用对象。This allows you to display the same image in each menu item to which the object is applied. > [!NOTE] > 如果和都设置属性，属性优先。If the and properties are both set, the property takes precedence. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定要绑定到的字段名称的菜单项的属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the name of the field to bind to the property of a menu item. 对于此示例中正常工作，必须将下面的示例 XML 数据复制到一个名为 Menu.xml 文件。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data below to a file named Menu.xml. summary.span: 获取或设置目标窗口或框架，在此目标窗口或框架中显示与应用 对象的菜单项关联的网页内容。

span.span: Gets or sets the target window or frame in which to display the Web page content associated with a menu item to which the object is applied.

value.span: 显示所链接的网页内容的目标窗口或框架。

span.span: The target window or frame in which to display the linked Web page content.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，该值刷新具有焦点的窗口或框架。

span.span: The default value is an empty string (""), which refreshes the window or frame with focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当控件绑定到数据源，请使用属性指定的窗口或框架中显示的 Web 内容时链接到的菜单项单击该菜单项。When the control is bound to a data source, use the property to specify the window or frame in which to display the Web content linked to a menu item when that menu item is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 设置此属性将替代属性对其的菜单项控件应用对象。Setting this property overrides the property of the control for the menu items to which the object is applied. 你可以有选择地通过重写此属性设置直接每个菜单项的属性。You can selectively override this property by setting the property of each menu item directly. 目标值必须以字母 a 到 Z （区分大小写），但下表中所示，以下划线开头某些特殊值除外范围的开头。Target values must begin with a letter in the range of A through Z (case-insensitive), except for certain special values that begin with an underscore, as shown in the following table. |目标值Target value|描述Description| |------------------|-----------------| |`_blank`|将内容呈现在一个没有框架的新窗口中。Renders the content in a new window without frames.| |`_parent`|将内容呈现在上一个框架集父级中。Renders the content in the immediate frameset parent.| |`_search`|在搜索窗格中呈现内容。Renders the content in the search pane.| |`_self`|将内容呈现在含焦点的框架中。Renders the content in the frame with focus.| |`_top`|将内容呈现在没有框架的全窗口中。Renders the content in the full window without frames.| > [!NOTE] > 请查看浏览器文档，确定是否支持 `_search` 值。Check your browser documentation to determine if the `_search` value is supported. 例如，Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0 及更高版本支持 `_search` 目标值。For example, Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0 and later support the `_search` target value. > [!NOTE] > 属性呈现为`target`属性。The property renders as a `target` attribute. `target`属性`anchor`XHTML 1.1 文档类型定义中不允许的元素。The `target` attribute on `anchor` elements is not allowed in the XHTML 1.1 document type definition. 未设置属性如果呈现的输出对象必须是符合 XHTML 1.1。Do not set the property if the rendered output for the object must be XHTML 1.1 compliant. 有关详细信息，请参阅主题[在 Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 的 XHTML 标准](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97)。For more information, refer to the topic [XHTML Standards in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97). > > 在创建可访问网页时，强烈建议你避免使用属性将作为目标另一个窗口。When creating accessible Web pages, it is strongly recommended you avoid using the property to target another window. 有关详细信息，请参阅[NIB: ASP.NET 可访问性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9b5f3e05-e88d-4248-a5f4-9e64850fa0ae)。For more information, see [NIB: ASP.NET Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9b5f3e05-e88d-4248-a5f4-9e64850fa0ae). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性以指定显示单击该菜单项时与菜单项关联的 Web 内容的窗口。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the window in which to display the Web content associated with a menu item, when that menu item is clicked. 对于此示例中正常工作，必须将下面的示例 XML 数据复制到一个名为 Menu.xml 文件。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data below to a file named Menu.xml. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuItemBinding#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemBinding/CS/menuitembindingcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuItemBinding#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemBinding/VB/menuitembindingvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码是前面的示例的示例站点地图数据。The following code is sample site map data for the previous example. `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` ``

设置属性以打开新窗口可以变得比较困难的辅助技术设备的用户使用的页面。Setting the property to open a new window can make it difficult for users of assistive technology devices to use the page. > [!NOTE] > 你可以重写启用各个菜单项，通过设置其直接属性。You can override enabling an individual menu item by setting its property directly. 如果数据源包含多个表或属性，您必须首先建立绑定条件设置属性，属性，和 / 或。If the data source contains multiple tables or attributes, you must first establish the binding criteria by setting the property, the property, or both. > [!NOTE] > 如果和都设置属性，属性优先。If the and properties are both set, the property takes precedence.

span.span: The text displayed for the menu item to which the is applied.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当控件绑定到数据源，请使用属性来指定要绑定到的文本属性对象。When the control is bound to a data source, use the property to specify the text to bind to the property of a object. 此文本显示在菜单项并对其的所有菜单项与共享应用对象。This text is displayed in a menu item and is shared with all menu items to which the object is applied. > [!NOTE] > 可以通过设置各个菜单项的文本重写其直接属性。You can override the text for an individual menu item by setting its property directly. 而不是使用此属性来显示每个菜单项中的相同的文本，还可以绑定属性通过设置数据源的字段的对象属性。Instead of using this property to display the same text in each menu item, you can also bind the property of a object to a field of a data source by setting the property. 呈现时，到每个菜单项的属性应用对象包含的字段中的相应值。When rendered, the property of each menu item to which the object is applied contains the corresponding value from the field. > [!NOTE] > 如果和都设置属性，属性优先。If the and properties are both set, the property takes precedence. 无法创建在空节点通过设置或属性为空字符串 ("")。You cannot create empty nodes in a control by setting the or properties to the empty string (""). 将这些属性设置为空字符串作为未设置这些属性的效果相同。Setting these properties to the empty string has the same effect as not setting the properties. 在这种情况下，控件创建默认绑定使用属性。In that case, the control creates a default binding using the property. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 数据访问内容映射](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f9219396-a0fa-481f-894d-e3d9c67d64f2)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Data Access Content Map](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f9219396-a0fa-481f-894d-e3d9c67d64f2). 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## remarks.format: ## Remarks 当控件绑定到数据源，请使用属性来指定要绑定到的文本属性对象。When the control is bound to a data source, use the property to specify the text to bind to the property of a object. 与对其的所有菜单项共享此工具提示应用对象。This ToolTip is shared with all menu items to which the object is applied. 当用户将鼠标指针定位在菜单项时，将显示指定的文本。When the user positions the mouse pointer over a menu item, the specified text is displayed. > [!NOTE] > 可以通过设置重写各个菜单项的工具提示其直接属性。You can override the ToolTip for an individual menu item by setting its property directly. 而不是使用此属性来指定每个菜单项的相同工具提示，还可以绑定属性通过设置数据源的字段的对象属性。Instead of using this property to specify the same ToolTip for each menu item, you can also bind the property of a object to a field of a data source by setting the property. 呈现时，到每个菜单项的属性应用对象包含的字段中的相应值。When rendered, the property of each menu item to which the object is applied contains the corresponding value from the field. > [!NOTE] > 如果和都设置属性，属性优先。If the and properties are both set, the property takes precedence. 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性指定当用户将鼠标指针定位在菜单项时要显示的工具提示。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the ToolTip to display when the user positions the mouse pointer over a menu item. 此工具提示显示每个菜单项应用对象。This ToolTip is displayed for each menu item to which the object is applied. 对于此示例中正常工作，必须将下面的示例 XML 数据复制到一个名为 Menu.xml 文件。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data below to a file named Menu.xml. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuItemBindingText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemBindingText/CS/menuitembindingtextcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuItemBindingText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemBindingText/VB/menuitembindingtextvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码是前面的示例的示例站点地图数据。The following code is sample site map data for the previous example. `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` ``

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当控件绑定到数据源，请使用属性来指定要绑定到的字段名称属性对象。When the control is bound to a data source, use the property to specify the name of the field to bind to the property of a object. 呈现时，到每个菜单项的属性应用对象包含的字段中的相应值。When rendered, the property of each menu item to which the object is applied contains the corresponding value from the field. 当用户在鼠标指针置于菜单项上时，将显示指定的文本。The specified text is displayed when the user positions the mouse pointer over a menu item. > [!NOTE] > 可以通过设置各个菜单项的文本重写其直接属性。You can override the text for an individual menu item by setting its property directly. 如果数据源包含多个表或属性，您必须首先建立绑定条件设置属性，属性，和 / 或。If the data source contains multiple tables or attributes, you must first establish the binding criteria by setting the property, the property, or both. 而不是使用此属性将绑定属性对象移到一个字段，你可以还将其绑定到静态值通过设置属性。Instead of using this property to bind the property of a object to a field, you can also bind it to a static value by setting the property. 这使你可以向其显示每个菜单项的相同工具提示应用对象。This allows you to display the same ToolTip for each menu item to which the object is applied. > [!NOTE] > 如果和都设置属性，属性优先。If the and properties are both set, the property takes precedence. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定要绑定到的字段名称的菜单项的属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the name of the field to bind to the property of a menu item. 对于此示例中正常工作，必须将下面的示例 XML 数据复制到一个名为 Menu.xml 文件。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data below to a file named Menu.xml. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当控件绑定到数据源，请使用属性来指定要绑定到的值属性对象。When the control is bound to a data source, use the property to specify the value to bind to the property of a object. 此值与对其的所有菜单项共享应用对象。This value is shared with all menu items to which the object is applied. 指定的值不会显示在菜单项和用于存储有关的菜单项的任何其他数据应用对象，如用于处理回发事件数据。The specified value is not displayed in a menu item and is used to store any additional data about a menu item to which the object is applied, such as data used for handling postback events. > [!NOTE] > 可以通过设置各个菜单项的值重写其直接属性。You can override the value for an individual menu item by setting its property directly. 不要使用此属性来指定每个菜单项相同的值，还可以绑定属性通过设置数据源的字段的对象属性。Instead of using this property to specify the same value for each menu item, you can also bind the property of a object to a field of a data source by setting the property. 呈现时，到每个菜单项的属性应用对象包含的字段中的相应值。When rendered, the property of each menu item to which the object is applied contains the corresponding value from the field. > [!NOTE] > 如果和都设置属性，属性优先。If the and properties are both set, the property takes precedence. 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性指定与菜单项关联的不可显示的值。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a nondisplayed value associated with a menu item. 在每个菜单项中使用此值应用对象。This value is used in each menu item to which the object is applied. 对于此示例中正常工作，必须将下面的示例 XML 数据复制到一个名为 Menu.xml 文件。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data below to a file named Menu.xml.
